sourceProperties.title: OpenShift Interactive Learning Portal
sourceProperties.description: These Interactive Learning Scenarios provide you with a pre-configured OpenShift® instance, accessible from your browser without any downloads or configuration. Use it to experiment, learn OpenShift and see how we can help solve real-world problems.

sourceProperties.title: OpenShift for Developers eBook
sourceProperties.description: Get a quick hands-on introduction to OpenShift, the open source Platform as a Service (PaaS) offering from Red Hat®. With this practical guide, you’ll learn the steps necessary to build, deploy, and host a complete real-world application on OpenShift without having to slog through long, detailed explanations of the technologies involved.

sourceProperties.title: Deploying to OpenShift eBook
sourceProperties.description: Get an in-depth tour of OpenShift®, the container-based software deployment and management platform from Red Hat® that provides a secure multitenant environment for the enterprise. This practical guide describes in detail how OpenShift, building on Kubernetes, enables you to automate the way you create, ship, and run applications in a containerized environment.

sourceProperties.title: DevOps with OpenShift eBook
sourceProperties.description: For many organizations, a big part of DevOps’ appeal is software automation using infrastructure-as-code techniques. This book presents developers, architects, and infra-ops engineers with a more practical option. You’ll learn how a container-centric approach from OpenShift® can help your team deliver quality software through a self-service view of IT infrastructure.
